basics.name: Oscar Eduardo Miramontes Raygoza
basics.label: Senior Front End Developer with over 6 years of experience.
basics.summary:
With over 6 years of experience as a Web Developer.

I am currently a Front Developer at The Palace Company.

I am a developer whose work focuses on web technology development for native desktop pages and applications, as well as general development. Thanks to my training, I consider myself capable of adapting to various circumstances and always strive to give my best in the projects I participate in. Additionally, I value teamwork and promote the principles of honesty, respect, and camaraderie. Therefore, I wish to evolve professionally in a company that shares these values.

work.name: The Palace Company
work.summary:
• I participated in the implementation of the company's authentication system using Cognito, ensuring secure access for all users in the new systems.

  • I contributed to the integration of the Adyen (Payments) gateway in several projects, facilitating secure transactions.

  • I led the frontend development team of a critical company application, ensuring successful and high-quality deliveries.

  • I designed and implemented a frontend development template to improve efficiency and consistency across projects.

  • I actively participated in various business projects, demonstrating versatile skills and a constant commitment to the team's success.

More information here

work.name: Electronic Cats
work.summary:
• Supervised the internal development team, responsible for creating various desktop applications and web pages using web technologies, including third-party projects such as Arduino.

  • Developed web and desktop applications for both internal use and external clients.

  • Provided support and maintenance for websites.

  • Configured Analytics and SEO.
